/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the gray and green hues of the buildings and trees lining the street. The buildings, mostly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The trees, a mix of green and brown, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The street itself is lined with red and white traffic lights, standing like sentinels guiding the flow of vehicles. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
